column4: perhaps an odd questions, but I've been using ubuntu for a while now (and quite like it), but would like to try another flavor of linux for the new laptop I ordered, I consider myself of intermediate expertise level, which other distros are viable for me to try out?
you could try gentoo if you don't mind having everything compiled from scratch
hope you got alot of time on your hands for gentoo
planttt: I'm an IT student so I have plenty of time to fiddle with distros ;)
